title: Marina Bay Sands Singapore
description: Luxe hotel offering multiple restaurants & bars, plus bay views, a spa & a rooftop pool.
hotelDescription:
Across from Marina Bay, this high-end hotel within a sprawling entertainment complex is 1 km from greenhouses at Gardens by the Bay and 18 km from Singapore Changi Airport.
 Polished rooms feature Wi-Fi, flat-screens and minibars, plus sitting areas and floor-to-ceilings windows. Upgraded rooms add city or bay views. Suites have living areas, kitchenettes, saunas, pianos and/or butler service. Room service is offered 24/7.
 Amenities include restaurants, bars, cafes and lounges, as well as event space, a casino and a museum. There's also a spa, a gym and an observation deck, along with a rooftop infinity pool. Breakfast is available.

questionsAndAnswers.question: in this situation they allowing membership holders only..when it is possible to go casino non members...?

reviews.name: RyssuRe Crvzae
reviews.text:
Me and my family went to Marina Bay Sands for a holiday. I can say that it was AMAZING!!
Since it was also our wedding anniversary, the staff gave us cake, balloon and we are surprised. Beyond expectations. The staff from the ground will assist you up to your room and instruct you about the facilities they have in the hotel. I can say that this is more than 5 star hotel. My family enjoyed it. 💯 recommended. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟⭐️

reviews.name: Saranjay Manohar
reviews.text: Great place, had my wedding booked here

reviews.name: Tim Lee
reviews.text:
Booking our wedding at MBS was the best decision of our life. The event manager, Rachel Ho, was very attentive to all our needs and went above and beyond in making our wedding a pleasant and memorable event. Her experience helped us immensely during the planning as she guided us on timeline and decision-making. Everything was arranged promptly and perfectly for us, including special requests. She made our wedding planning a much less stressful process for us, which was a huge plus point which we appreciate deeply.

The dining banquet hall was big and spacious, and the decorations were beautiful as shown in pictures. Food was sumptuous and delightful.

Our package included a night stay in the wedding suite. The room was big and had an excellent view of Gardens by the Bay and the sea, a stunning view to wake up to in the morning. It was luxurious and much needed relaxation, especially after the wedding night.

Premium service team were ever-ready to assist us, anticipating our needs to provide us with an exceptional experience. Special shout out to Andre and Celeste who arranged for chocolates in our room and even gave us a thoughtful souvenir to let us remember our wedding and stay at MBS.

Overall, we had an unforgettable experience and will not hesitate to recommend MBS Singapore to anyone who plans to hold a wedding in the future.

Thank you again!

reviews.name: Seow Kweng Hong
reviews.text:
Attended a wedding lunch at MBS Peony Junior Ballroom.
The directional sign was very misleading. The Ballroom was located at L4 but directional sign indicated that L4 are meeting rooms. Spent quite a bit of time to locate the Ballroom 😩

reviews.name: Ifa Zahra
reviews.text:
Managed to stayed in here during our wedding anniversary, out of nowhere when I was doing hotel check-in, they offered us free upgrade room from deluxe city view to suite city view and the room was superb, we got the killer view 😍😍
all in all, we had the best experience stayed in there. We will comeback to here.. one day 💕 Thank you Marina Bay Hotel 😍

reviews.name: Triana Mohd Kamil
reviews.text: Booked an Orchid Suite Garden View as a gift for my parents 40th wedding anniversary. MBS Premium Services (shoutout to Mark, Joanne, Diana and team) were fantastic in helping us secure the room by 1pm early check in for the surprise set up, the complimentary limousine service to pick my parents up and the flawless execution for the surprise event! The service team really went above and beyond for us and since this is our first stay, we were thoroughly impressed with their personalized service.

reviews.name: Angela W.
reviews.text: We stayed in Orchid suite on top floor, beautiful view from both the living room and living. Wonderful staycation for our wedding anniversary 🙂

reviews.name: Melvin Tay
reviews.text:
My wife and I had a staycation here for 3 days and 2 nights. Service staff were really nice and we enjoyed our stay. They found out that we were celebrating our wedding day and upgraded our room to a higher floor and nicer view. We were surprised by it because it was the counter staff's initiative and we were very touched by that gesture.

We had some F&B vouchers through our staycation package but had troubles redeeming it. We struggled for awhile and we finally managed to get some help to redeem it.

Overall, really loved the stay. My only qualm is that (due to safe distancing measures) every time we wanted to take the lift to our room, we would have to pass a security staff and present our room number and name. However, totally understand why it is necessary. Just found it a little tedious.

reviews.name: Edel N
reviews.text: Had a one night staycation. We need to book online the infinity pool slot after we booked the room which I didn’t do it. One week before our stay I could booked the pool online as all slots are unavailable. On thé day when I checked in, I told the manager I was upset that I couldn’t visit the pool. Jessica was very helpful. She asked to give her some time and see what she could do. She managed to get a time slot for 3 persons in the pool. I was very thankful to her. Really appreciate her help. We got a free upgrade to deluxe king room facing the garden on the 49th floor. The room is big with an awesome balcony view. When I booked the hotel, i wrote in comment that it was my wedding anniversary. We got complimentary lovely chocolate cake and a coffee cup made of chocolate. So wonderful. There were so much things to do. We need to book a slot for the gym, a slot sauna/hot tub for female and free access to the sky park observation deck. We also had a good dinner at Spargo. Origin + Bloom has fantastic sandwiches n breakfast options where hotel guests got 20% discount. I recommend Early Riser bun. Overall, it’s a marvellous stay here.

reviews.name: John Soong
reviews.text: COVID19 Pandemic has caused lots of restrictions to travel. For our wedding anniversary we opted to stay local for a couple of nights to support our local businesses. Many thanks MBS for supporting frontline Healthcare Workers. We were upgraded to a Premium King with Harbour Views, which were breathtaking. The room was cavernous with a balcony, which was great to watch sunrises/sunsets. The toilet was particularly large with separate shower cubical from standing bathtub in the centre, and distinct Toto waterclosets. The minibar was complimentary and foamy Nespresso coffee got us off to right-starts in the morning.  We returned to a lovely chocolate cake in our room in the afternoon-> such a thoughtful gesture for our anniversary! The hotel and adjacent Shoppes provided us with lots to do. A snippet of our cherished memories include eating calamari and sipping drinks (1 for 1!) while overlooking Marina Bay in the evening (Lava on the 57th floor), watching the sunset over Singapore on the Skydeck (free for hotel guests), swimming in the infinity pool with amazing views of the Singapore Skyline at night(book your slot!) and the amazing Future World exhibit at the Arts Science Museum (hotel guests get discounts). Tips for future guests->1) Sign up for the Marina Bay Sands Rewards scheme->you get offers and discounts for lots at MBS 2) We had breakfast included. You can opt for Rise (in the lobby) or Spago (55th floor). We really loved the views at Spago, and it was a tad bit quieter. 3)Free Valet/Parking were included in our package->very useful! 4) Amazing bakery called Origin and Blooms in lobby->the coffee, pastries and sandwiches are out-of-this-world good. The staff were amazingly helpful and cheerful, especially Alan at the concierge desk who was very patient with all our queries, and sorted out an issue for us, and the check-in staff who made sure to send us the lovely cake. The rooms were lovely, but some wear is noticeable if you look very hard.
